name: 胡憲倫
objective:
To understand how Life Cycle Thinking and Life Cycle Management can solve environmental problems. Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), one of the most important tools for analyzing and assessing environmental problems will be taught during the course of the semester. Students will also be learning a popular LCA software, SimaPro. Various applications related to LCA, such as carbon footprinting and labeling, and eco-design will also be practiced in the class. 
瞭解生命週期思維(Life Cycle Thinking)與生命週期管理(LCM)對環境問題解決的重要性；學會生命週期評估(LCA)的原理及方法，並學會如何評估產品每個生命週期階段的環境及社會衝擊；學習LCA的軟體操作及其應用；學會應用LCA來解決環境問題及政策制定，包括產品環境化設計、碳足跡及碳標籤等。
schedule:
1.　　企業永續發展及生命週期與系統思考介紹(Life Cycle and Systems Thinking)
2.　　生命週期管理介紹(Life Cycle Management, LCM)：概論(Introduction)、工具及案例(Tools and Cases)
3.　　ISO 14040系列與生命週期評估(LCA含軟體)介紹 (Introduction to LCA, including ISO 14040 series and SimaPro Software)
4.　　生命週期評估方法(LCA Methodology)：目標及範疇界定 (Goal and Scope Definition) 
5.　　生命週期評估方法(LCA Methodology)：生命週期盤查分析(Life Cycle Inventory Analysis)
6.　　生命週期評估方法(LCA Methodology)：生命週期盤查分析及生命週期衝擊評估(Life Cycle Inventory Analysis and Life Cycle Impact Assessment) 
7.　　生命週期評估方法(LCA Methodology)：生命週期衝擊評估(Life Cycle Impact Assessment)
8.　　生命週期評估方法(LCA Methodology)：生命週期結果闡釋、不確定及敏感度分析(Interpretation and Uncertainty and Sensitivity Analysis)
9.　　期中考(Mid-term Exam)
10.　　簡化的生命週期評估及社會/永續生命週期評估(Streamlined LCA and Social/ Sustainability Life Cycle Assessment)
11.　　歐盟環境足跡介紹(EU Environmental Footprint)
12.　　LCA 應用(LCA Applications)：碳足跡與水足跡分析及標籤(Carbon and Water Footprinting and Labeling)
13.　　LCA 應用(LCA Applications)：綠色製程、產品設計與發展(Green Processes, Product Design and Development)
14.　　LCA 應用(LCA Applications)：廢棄物管理(Waste Management)
15.　　Special Topic: Natural Capital Accounting and LCA
16.　　期末考(Final Exam)
17.　　專題報告－分組簡報Team Project Presentation
18.　　專題報告－分組簡報Team Project Presentation
scorePolicy:
 Participation and Homework：30 %   Exams：30 %
 Team Project (Report and Oral Presentation)： 40 %
